data.title: Richmond American Homes
data.text:
We could not be more happy. Thank you so much, we are blessed and so appreciative of your company and team of people who helped make our home purchase a reality.

~ Domenic G., Vacaville, CA

Very good from start to finish. Team was very communicative, kept us informed of how home construction was progressing, what delays we could expect, and overall made it a stress free endeavor for us.

~ Kevin H., Washougal, WA

As first time home buyers, we are grateful to Richmond American Homes for building our dream home. We thank all the staff who have been very friendly & responsive.

~ Margie S., Tucson, AZ

We love the layout of our home. The large windows provide lots of natural light coming in which is very important to us. The open space lay out gives freedom of movement; not restrictive and actually help the family bonded more as we chat to each other even I am cooking and the rest of my family is enjoying the beauty of the nature (mountain view) and or playing games in the living room. We are truly blessed!!

~ Denis D., Tucson, AZ

From start to finish Richmond American Homes was the best!

~ Kevin R., Surprise, AZ

Our overall experience was great because of the wonderful staff employed by Richmond American Homes. The staff provided quality service throughout this entire process. We were given a great overview of what to expect with our home purchase, great follow-up, and timely service. The construction team was phenomenal. We had a great walk-through of our home. They took the time to show us the features of the home and answered our questions. The financial process was done in a timely manner and was more than we expected.

~ Marie C., Avondale, AZ

We can truly say the process was seamless. Everyone did their part to make this a super awesome home buying experience for us. We are happy that the service was timely and consistent throughout the entire process. Thank you Team Richmond for being so efficient, caring, and providing quality service.

~ Marie C., Avondale, AZ

Sales and construction crew very professional and kind. My overall experience with this crew was/is epic. Thank you.

~ Kurt H., Coolidge, AZ

To start, Richmond did not raise the price of our home during the building process. I saw other builders raise their home prices prior to closing. Richmond standing behind the price we signed on was such a blessing! Each and every person I worked with throughout my Richmond home buying process was amazing!

~ Paige D., Payson, UT

We built our prior home with another builder and it was not as good of an experience as what we had with Richmond. From there very beginning of the process, we felt cared for, looked out for, and that our needs/wants in our home were always the priority. Every person that we dealt with was willing to hear us out to provide us exactly what we were looking for.

~ Casey L., Syracuse, UT

Our overall experience was really pleasant, everyone who works at Richmond helped and treated us good, always in touch with us. The upgrades were exactly how we asked, with the best quality. Several options was given during the Home Gallery visit, so we built the house how we wanted. We received the house according to the initial plan, on time. All details was covered. Recommended 100 %.

~ Jaime D., Herriman, UT

Everyone at Richmond has been communicative, knowledgeable, and great to work with. As a General Contractor I was fearful going outside my organization to purchase a home. So far I have not been let down by the Salt Lake City Richmond American team.

~ Tyson W., Layton, UT

We are very happy with the service that we received. We were treated with respect and we appreciate the Richmond team.

~ Brenda T., Lake Point, UT

My wife and I have truly enjoyed our experience with the sales staff and construction staff and home design personnel . Everyone was professional, informative and friendly

~ Daniel V., Saratoga Springs, UT

Excellent workmanship, and wonderful finished product. We are pleased.

~ David P., West Point, UT

The people are amazing. Great customer service. Everything was explained to me. If I had even the smallest issue, it was addressed and I got the help I needed with it.

~ Casey S., Frederick, CO

This was an amazing experience from beginning to end! Everyone was friendly, helpful and so attentive. They all made this a great experience.

~ Laurie A., Frederick, CO

Our family was kept informed and up to date the whole way, and we closed a month early! Our team was amazing and so responsive! Thank you Richmond American!

~ Lindsey R., Frederick, CO

The entire process was smooth and consistent. I loved my team! Best experience I could ask for!

~ Lindsey R., Frederick, CO

This was one the best experiences of buying a home, I have ever had. The staff in every department was friendly, helpful and very knowledgeable. I would absolutely recommend Richmond American to future home buyers.

~ Laura M., Rocklin, CA

The best experience from the entire Richmond team! From the start to the buying process, always given us the time to answer all questions. Able to provided honest feedback on the process. The finished product let me tell you! I'm still in shock, I have a beautiful home/ smart home. A million-dollar home without paying the million dollars.

~ Willy G., Hemet, CA
